name: Syndicated
description: The Orion Syndicate is already a fearsome force throughout the galaxy. But when they spurn certain individuals attempting to forge lucrative connection, they may have inadvertently created their greatest rival - and the galaxy's newest threat!
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Cardassian, Ferengi Traditionalist, and Romulan Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Remy, Harral, Tendi, or Orion crew will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Remy, Harral, Tendi, or Orion
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Kim
featured_crew.flavor: Kim wakes up in a medical facility with strange sores. He learns he and Torres are ill and could be dangerous to their respective crews.

featured_crew.name: Harral
featured_crew.flavor: Along with other cadets, Harral took part in the research exercise on Geryon. As an Orion, he has had to work hard to earn trust and respect.

action.name: I Have To Work Twice As Hard

featured_crew.name: Tendi
featured_crew.flavor: Tendi is cast as the savage warrior queen who comes from a long line of Orion Pirates, in the Holonovel “Crisis Point” created by Mariner.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Tendi
rewards.flavor: Tendi left her pirate days behind to join Starfleet. She brings relentless enthusiasm and friendship to the entire team.

action.name: Did That Full Molecular Engorgement Feel Amazing?!

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Kim
rewards.flavor: Kim wakes up in a medical facility with strange sores. He learns he and Torres are ill and could be dangerous to their respective crews.

rewards.name: Tendi
rewards.flavor: Tendi is cast as the savage warrior queen who comes from a long line of Orion Pirates, in the Holonovel “Crisis Point” created by Mariner.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Harral
rewards.flavor: Along with other cadets, Harral took part in the research exercise on Geryon. As an Orion, he has had to work hard to earn trust and respect.

action.name: I Have To Work Twice As Hard

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!
